description: This file contains a mock class UdevImplMock for unit testing, which inherits from UdevImpl and utilizes Google Mock to mock methods related to udev device management.

classes.name: UdevImplMock
classes.description: A mock implementation of UdevImpl interface using Google Mock for testing purposes.

methods.name: udev_new
methods.description: Returns a pointer to a new udev object.

methods.name: udev_enumerate_new
methods.description: Creates a new udev enumerate object.

methods.name: udev_enumerate_add_match_subsystem
methods.description: Adds a match criterion for subsystem to the enumeration.

methods.name: udev_enumerate_scan_devices
methods.description: Scans for devices matching the enumeration criteria.

methods.name: udev_enumerate_get_list_entry
methods.description: Retrieves the list entry from the enumeration.

methods.name: udev_enumerate_unref
methods.description: Unreferences and deletes the enumeration object.

methods.name: udev_unref
methods.description: Unreferences and deletes the udev object.

methods.name: udev_list_entry_get_name
methods.description: Gets the name from a list entry.

methods.name: udev_device_new_from_syspath
methods.description: Creates a new udev device object from a system path.

methods.name: udev_device_unref
methods.description: Unreferences and deletes the udev device object.

methods.name: udev_device_get_parent_with_subsystem_devtype
methods.description: Gets the parent device with specific subsystem and devtype.
